job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: love wine we are looking for software engineers and account managers excited about the wine industry our software is integrated with some of the largest companies in the nation in the alchohol and beverage industry ltbrgtltbrgtwe are growing fast and looking to double in size in the next yearltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for javascript and ruby engineers who are interested in or have experience with the shopify platform ltbrgtltbrgtremote opportunites are available
